articles.author: Borys Kit
articles.title: Glenn Close Joins Daniel Craig in ‘Knives Out 3’ (Exclusive) - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Production on 'Wake Up Dead Man,' the latest installment of Rian Johnson's murder mystery movie series, begins in June in the U.K.
articles.content: Glenn Close is the latest star to board the new Knives Out mystery movie. The actress has joined the all-star cast of Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery, Rian Johnson’s  thriller headlined by Dan… [+1617 chars]

articles.title: George Clooney And Brad Pitt Are Fixers Forced To Work Together In Jon Watts' Wolfs Trailer - Empire
articles.description: A crime clean-up operation spirals out of control in the Spider-Man director's original comedy-thriller. Watch the trailer at Empire.
